    character, intent(in) :: c

    res = (c >= 'a' .and. c < = 'z')
end function

Function is_punctuation(c) result(res)
    character, intent(in) :: c
    logical :: res
    res = (c == '.' .or. c == ',' .or. c == '!' .or. c == '?')
end function
